title: Essential Writings
description: Modern Spiritual Masters Series. Selections and a short biography offer the wisdom of the Anglican writer, an outstanding voice in twentieth-century spirituality and a modern pioneer in the mysticism of everyday life.Introduction: The practical mystic / by Emilie Griffin --The spiritual life --The house of the soul --Aspects of mysticism --The soul's journey --Worship --Practical advice : from the Letters of Evelyn Underhill --Glory
author: Eveyln Underhill
